metadata.title: CVE-2013-6456

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15

metadata.description: The LXC driver (lxc/lxc_driver.c) in libvirt 1.0.1 through 1.2.1 allows local users to (1) delete arbitrary host devices via the virDomainDeviceDettach API and a symlink attack on /dev in the container; (2) create arbitrary nodes (mknod) via the virDomainDeviceAttach API and a symlink attack on /dev in the container; and cause a denial of service (shutdown or reboot host OS) via the (3) virDomainShutdown or (4) virDomainReboot API and a symlink attack on /dev/initctl in the container, related to "paths under /proc/$PID/root" and the virInitctlSetRunLevel function.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 is installed
